comment._content: John Ernest Williamson (1881-1966) entering the "photosphere", his own invention from which he filmed and photographed the deep sea.

comment.author: 23518258@N04
comment._content: Thanks for the information, Infrogmation.  I was wondering what was going on here.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: He took his first pictures in 1913, while submerged in Chesapeake Bay. In 1914, he took the first underwater motion pictures, from an improved version of the photosphere, in the Bahamas.
